EmailTemplate.name: CS Lead Waitlist Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Community Solar Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear,
Congratulations, your BlueWave Community Solar Application has been approved!
We are pleased to help you achieve monthly utility bill savings, while simultaneously contributing to a cleaner environment.
Within the next 2 business days, you will receive an email containing your contract that can be signed and shipped back to us electronically. Once received by BlueWave, you will receive a final email from BlueWave welcoming you to the BlueWave solar community and detailing your BlueWave Community Solar Customer Portal credentials.
In the meantime, if you have any questions, please contact us at info@bluewave-capital.com.
Sincerely,
BlueWave Customer Care
